text: The 2012 Central Hockey League All-Star Game was held on January 11, 2012 at Tim's Toyota Center in Prescott Valley, Arizona, home of the Arizona Sundogs, in the 2011–12 CHL season.Arizona Sundogs Awarded 2012 CHL All-Star Game The Sundogs lost 6–4 to the CHL's All- Stars.http://www.pointstreak.com/prostats/boxscore.html?gameid=1833334 ==References== ==External links== *Official Site of the Arizona Sundogs *Official Site of the Central Hockey League All-Star Game Category:Central Hockey League All-Star Games
title: 2012 Central Hockey League All-Star Game
